import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import './home.css' import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import village from './bonesville_village.png' import castle from './bonesville_castle.png' import "./home.css" import tavern from './Slider/tavern.jpg'; import bank from './Slider/bg-bank.jpeg'; import marketplace from './Slider/bg-marketplace.jpeg'; import raffle from './Slider/bg-raffle.jpeg'; import adventure from './Slider/bonefire.jpg'; import merchant from './Slider/merchant.png'; import roadmap from './roadmap.png'; const ipfsUri128 = "https://croskull.mypinata.cloud/ipfs/QmZn1HvYE1o1J8LhNpxFTj5k8LQb2bWT49YvbrhB3r19Xx/" const ipfsUri480 = "https://croskull.mypinata.cloud/ipfs/QmWu9bKunKbv8Kkq8wEWGpCaW47oMBbH6ep4ZWBzAxHtgj/" const ipfsUriFull = "https://croskull.mypinata.cloud/ipfs/" const Home = () => { useEffect(() => { let b = document.getElementById('underworld-btn'); let d = document.getElementById('header'); console.log(d.offsetWidth, b.offsetWidth); let h = (d.offsetHeight - b.offsetHeight) / 2; b.style.transform = 'translateY(' + h + 'px)'; }, []) return ( <>

What is CroSKull

Bonesville has always been a mysterious town. Among the dark streets of the city, it is rare to see people stopping to talk to each other. Many elderly people leave their homes just to carry out duties or run errands, whereas the few children who have never played with each other do not know what fun is. At Bonesville, everything is sad, gloomy, melancholic, still. Just one person‚Äôs soul stands out across all the grey souls of the city‚Ä¶ Dr. Jiko spends most of his time in his secret laboratory located inside the dark Bonesville Castle. After years of failure, he managed to improve his alchemical formula By combining mysterious potions, he found a way to bring joy and life back to the city‚Ä¶ 6,666 funny and crazy Croskulls are ready to invade the streets!
The Croskull is a collection of 6,666 uniquely generated NFTs stored in the Cronos Chain. Each Croskull NFT is based on 6 attributes with different rarities. A Croskull is not simply a PFP but is also the key to the insane Dr. Jiko‚Äôs laboratory experiments.

What We Have

F.A.Q.

What is the CroSkull Project?
The CroSkull is a collection of 6.666 uniquely generated NFTs stored in the Cronos Chain. Each CroSkull NFT is based on 6+ attributes with different rarities. A CroSkull is not simply a PFP but is also the key to the insane Dr. Jiko‚Äôs laboratory experiments.
Total supply?
6666 CroSkull NFTs. ( 60 NFTs will be kept by the Team for GA, partnerships etc)
Mint price?
199 CRO
Where can we Mint?
We will build a section dedicated on our website: Mint
Wen Mint Sir?
- The Pre-Sale will start on 27/12/2021 - The Public Mint will start on 29/12/2021
Can we use Mobile for Mint?
Yes, you can.
How many NFT can be minted for each one?
-Pre-sale: 5 max for each wallet. -Public Mint: 10 max cap for each transaction. (no limit for wallet)
Will there be a Whitelist?
Yes, there is a presale list and a OG contest.
What is the OG and how to obtain it?
The OG is a special role for our Discord members, it will serve to ensure the airdrop of the red potion shortly after minting. You'll have to enjoy accumulating 3000 SkullCoin, reach level 10 xp rank (Pro-Skuller) and be a CroSkull hodler to get the opportunity to make a deal with the merchant in „Äåüë≥üèΩ„Äçmerchant-shop
What is the Potion System in our Lab?
You'll need of two potions to create a useful evolution of your CroSkull: - the red potion will be guaranteed airdropped to the first 33 members that will accumulate 3000 Skullcoin, reach level 10 xp rank (Pro-Skuller) and will be a CroSkull hodlers. - the blue potion will be guaranteed airdropped to the first 33 members who will get more valid invitations on Discord. The rest of the potions will be airdropped to a few lucky random 2+ Croskull hodlers. By combining the two potions, you can obtain a new evolved CroSkull that can be staked to obtain more advantages... üëÄ more info TBA.
How will the Pre-Sale work?
Everyone who will have reached level 5 XP (@BonesVilleSettler) on 25/12 can request to be Whitelisted for the Pre-Sale (up to a maximum of 167 people). The 33 OG will be added automatically.
) } export default Home;
